title: For a brief period tonight, some parts of the world will go dark. It's Earth Hour
content:
1. For a brief period tonight, some parts of the world will go dark. It's Earth Hour  CNN
  2. Lights off as Earth Hour highlights climate change  Reuters
  3. If LG can shut operations down for an Earth Hour, you can power down for just 60 minutes, right?  PC Gamer
  4. Earth Hour has never been about the big things ‘they’ do – but the small things you and I can do today  The Times of India Blog
  5. Earth Hour - Switch off Lights Tonight for 1 hour - "We need to make peace with nature" - UN Chief  United Nations
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
For a brief period tonight, some parts of the world will go dark. It's Earth Hour  CNN 
Lights off as Earth Hour highlights climate change  Reuters
If LG can shut operations down for an Earth Hour, you can power down for just 60 minutes, right?  PC Gamer
Earth Hour has never been about the big things ‘they’ do – but the small things you and I can do today  The Times of India Blog
Earth Hour - Switch off Lights Tonight for 1 hour - "We need to make peace with nature" - UN Chief  United Nations

localize.title: 今晚有一段短暂的时间，世界上的一些地方将进入黑暗。现在是 "地球一小时"。
今晚有一段短暫的時間，世界上的一些地方將進入黑暗。現在是 "地球一小時"。
